key_metrics.name: Data Center Revenue
key_metrics.context: Driven by demand for Hopper computing platform

key_metrics.name: Gaming Revenue
key_metrics.context: Driven by GeForce RTX 40 Series GPUs

other: GAAP gross margin: 73.0% plus or minus 50 basis points
Non-GAAP gross margin: 73.5% plus or minus 50 basis points
GAAP and non-GAAP tax rates: 16.5% plus or minus 1%

guidance.commentary: Strong demand for Hopper and Blackwell systems, with supply constraints expected for Blackwell. Demand for the Hopper architecture is strong and H200 offering grew significantly in the quarter.

product_launches.details: Improved production yields, shipments to begin in Q4 FY25
product_launches.impact: Expected to exceed supply for several quarters in fiscal 2026

initiatives: Focus on R&D and cloud service agreements
Increasing production capacity to address supply constraints

risks.details: Potential impact on demand and supply chain
risks.mitigation: Diversification of supply chain and customer base

competitive_advantages: Strong demand for AI and data center products
Leading technology in GPUs and computing platforms
Growing demand for AI and data center solutions

key_positives: Record revenue of $35.1B with exceptional 94% year-over-year growth driven by AI demand
Net income of $19.3B represents 109% year-over-year growth with 55% net margin
Data Center revenue of $30.8B dominates total revenue at 87.7% of total
Strong guidance for Q4 with revenue expected between $36.8B-$38.3B
key_concerns: Supply constraints expected for new Blackwell architecture
Heavy dependence on Data Center revenue (87.7% of total)
Global economic conditions could impact demand and supply chain

notable_quotes.speaker: CFO
notable_quotes.quote: Demand for the Hopper architecture is strong and our H200 offering grew significantly in the quarter.

highlights.investment_thesis: NVIDIA continues to dominate the AI revolution with record-breaking financial performance driven by unprecedented demand for its data center and AI computing platforms. While supply constraints for new Blackwell architecture indicate strong future demand, the company's heavy dependence on data center revenue and potential global economic headwinds present key risks to monitor.

metadata.notes: High-quality financial data with comprehensive segment breakdown. Missing some balance sheet details and employee metrics. Strong guidance and strategic information available.
